items.sentence: Mary was at the bottom of the class. Now she's at the top.
Tom's job is to make sure that everything goes as planned.
I could sit on the beach chair and drink lemonade all day.
When I cough twice, that's your cue to come into the room.
I learned about lots of different types of polymers today.
The majority of Americans are against corporal punishment.
I don't remember the last time I enjoyed myself this much.
I don't think I can apply for a job anywhere. I'm too old.
I keep my money in a hole behind a painting in my bedroom.
I know that it sounds crazy, but you've got to believe me.
